TopicTitle: Cleveland-Class Light Cruiser Replica (With BDArmory Variant)

Articles.Content:
*Cleveland* Class Light Cruiser

![hPMkZ3M.png](http://i.imgur.com/hPMkZ3M.png)

The *Cleveland*-class cruisers were designed by the US Navy with a goal of increased range, along with upgrades in armaments and defense. This craft is functional and is crewed by seven kerbals. Control with yaw.

Parts: 804

Mass: 150.7 tons

Cost: ![rwGmwPktxe9GN9sIWk4qgs7mx8kGM36BYxgXkPFcrPvMMOFmUS-llR98o0Huo9APlvB6MtXHhY5JC43mKP5FOyT7guTZTim5V__BhS316zEpYK4MhkNBDarF8mnSUmwNlYVsKHA](https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/rwGmwPktxe9GN9sIWk4qgs7mx8kGM36BYxgXkPFcrPvMMOFmUS-llR98o0Huo9APlvB6MtXHhY5JC43mKP5FOyT7guTZTim5V__BhS316zEpYK4MhkNBDarF8mnSUmwNlYVsKHA)416853

BDArmory version: 4 Flak turrets, 12 Howitzers on 6 turrets, 4 30mm cannons

[**Stock Version Download**](http://www./download/ghp8vmy7r115q7n/Cleveland-Class_Light_Cruiser.craft)
[**BDArmory version Download**](http://www./download/34b4bts1fuejoed/Cleveland-Class_Light_Cruiser_BD.craft)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/BpVVV)

This craft is part of my WWII Replica Project (See signature) - I thought this was an important enough addition to warrant it's own thread, I won't be creating a new thread for every new craft.
